name: Gambit Heart
description: Turn-Based Tactics meets Open-World Exploration in Gambit Heart! Make your hero, meet new friends, find treasure, defeat dungeons, and more in this fun new take on role-playing games! Early Access means watch the world grow!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista SP1+ Processor: Core 2 Duo / Athlon X2 or greater Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 10 or greater DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Core i3 / AMD FX series or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 11 or greater DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
